Text: Any idea where to find English (or German) subtitles for this movie?

Wrong movie.  darkvlad's sub link is for the following movie from 1972:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0069421/
You can see for sure by opening up the SRT file with Notepad.  You get the following first entry:

00:00:38,038 --> 00:00:43,999
YOURVICEE IS A LOCEKED ROOM
AND ONLY I HAVETHE KEY

Anyone else come up with anything?
Nice movie,only wrong link for the sub,keep looking everyone,i'l try too
No one found english subs yet?
Why the fuck is so hard to attach (working) subtitles to the uploaded movies...

Correct subtitles for this movie. Perfectly synchronises.

http://subscene.com/english/La-chiave-The-Key/subtitle-336360.aspx
